name: Tiny Planets (Antoine Lefevre)
description:
In Tiny Planets, create your own tiny planet and share it with your friends! This is a cute and short experience to help relax and take care of yourself.

School work made in Unity for Mac by Leili Mir Khosravi, Audrey Le Cadre and Antoine Lefevre. You may experience some issues on the Windows version, I'm currently trying to fix it.

Graphics by Kenney.
